page.title: 13Dundee's Industrial Estates
page.content: Dundee's busiest industrial estates lie in our area.We visited two firms. One was {NCR,}whose Dundee factory supplies automatic teller machines for the whole world.(These are machines where you can get money using your plastic card). On our visit we saw workers testing the machines but the funniest part of our visit was when we saw a robot testing four machines one after the other.This robot tests the same machines 24 hours per day for a whole month! Some of us also went to {Levi Strauss.}They arrived in Dundee in 1972.They make jeans in 59 styles and from 17 fabrics--which means over a 1000 different types of jeans! In Dundee{Levi}employ 320 people turning out 52,000 pairs per week, each pair taking 10\ minutes to make.From the factory the jeans are sent all over Britain and to Scandinavia.
